verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [was] a <S%H5288>youth<s%> I <S%H157>loved<s%> him, And out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> My <S%H1121>son.<s%>

The more they <S%H7121>called<s%> them, The <S%H3651>more<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> from them; They kept <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> to the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> And <S%H6999>burning<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H6456>idols.<s%>
Yet it is I who <S%H7270>taught<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H7270>walk,<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> them in My <S%H2220>arms;<s%> But they did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that I <S%H7495>healed<s%> them.

I <S%H4900>led<s%> them with <S%H9112>cords<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> with <S%H5688>bonds<s%> of <S%H160>love,<s%> And I <S%H1961>became<s%> to them as one who <S%H7311>lifts<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from their <S%H3895>jaws;<s%> And I <S%H5186>bent<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> [and] <S%H398>fed<s%> them.

They will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> But <S%H804>Assyria<s%> â€“ he will be their <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> [to Me.]

And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H9123>whirl<s%> against their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> And will <S%H3615>demolish<s%> their gate <S%H905>bars<s%> And <S%H3615>consume<s%> [them] <S%H4480>because<s%> of their <S%H4156>counsels.<s%>

So My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H8511>bent<s%> on <S%H4878>turning<s%> from Me. Though they <S%H7121>call<s%> them to [the One] on <S%H5920>high,<s%> <S%H3808>None<s%> at <S%H3162>all<s%> <S%H7311>exalts<s%> [Him.]

<S%H349>How<s%> can I <S%H5414>give<s%> you up, O <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>? How can I <S%H4042>surrender<s%> you, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H349>How<s%> can I <S%H5414>make<s%> you like <S%H126>Admah<s%>? How can I <S%H7760>treat<s%> you like <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>? My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H2015>over<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> Me, <S%H3162>All<s%> My <S%H5150>compassions<s%> are <S%H3648>kindled.<s%>

I will not <S%H6213>execute<s%> My <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger;<s%> I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%> For I am <S%H410>God<s%> and not <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> And I will not <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H9409>wrath.<s%>

They will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He will <S%H7580>roar<s%> like a <S%H9030>lion;<s%> <S%H3588>Indeed<s%> He will <S%H7580>roar,<s%> And [His] <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H2729>come<s%> <S%H2729>trembling<s%> from the <S%H3220>west.<s%>

They will <S%H2729>come<s%> <S%H2729>trembling<s%> like <S%H6833>birds<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And like <S%H3123>doves<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> And I will <S%H3427>settle<s%> them in their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5437>surrounds<s%> Me with <S%H3585>lies,<s%> And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H5750>also<s%> <S%H7300>unruly<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> Even <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> who is <S%H539>faithful.<s%>
